LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_LostWanderer_Desc:
A {PAWN_title} named {PAWN_nameDef} has stumbled out of the wilderness, and wishes to join the colony.

[PAWN_pronoun] is willing to contribute, but will not leave voluntarily, claiming to have nowhere else to go. [PAWN_pronoun] manages to stutter out something about an animal attack, but quickly falls silent.

You can choose to turn {PAWN_objective} down and send {PAWN_objective} away. However, your colonists will be disturbed at sending someone away in need.
